name: pancreatic acinar cell adenocarcinoma
definition: A pancreatic adenocarcinoma that has_material_basis_in cells with morphological resemblance to acinar cells and is associated with increased serum lipase. [url:http\://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Acinar_cell_carcinoma_of_the_pancreas, url:http\://www.pathologyoutlines.com/topic/pancreasacinar.html]
